document.full_text: scores of people fled tokyo on tuesday and residents stayed indoors over fears that radiation from an earthquake-stricken nuclear plant could waft over one of the world's biggest and most densely populated cities.
document.title: radiation fears spark panic, evacuations in tokyo
lines_and_colors: scores of people fled tokyo on tuesday and residents stayed indoors over fears that radiation from an earthquake-stricken nuclear plant could waft over one of the world's biggest and most densely populated cities.
